channel.title: The Eric and Wendy Schmidt Center for Data Science and Environment at Berkeley on DS4E
channel.description: Recent content in The Eric and Wendy Schmidt Center for Data Science and Environment at Berkeley on DS4E

item.title: Launch Team
item.description: Douglas McCauley Douglas McCauley is an Associate Adjunct Professor in the Department of Environmental Science, Policy and Management at UC Berkeley and an Associate Professor in the Department of Ecology, Evolution and Marine Biology at UC Santa Barbara. Doug is an ecologist and conservation biologist that uses a diverse suite of methods to better understand how nature works and to create new applied research tools to better manage and conserve biodiversity.
